select count(1) from customInfo where followManId = #{followManId} and
to_days(startDate) = to_days(NOW())
to_days(startDate) < to_days(NOW()) and statu = '0'
to_days(planDate) = to_days(NOW())
DATE_FORMAT( startDate, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )

select ci.*,c.name customName,c.phoneNo customPhoneNo from customInfo ci left join custom c on ci.customId = c.id where ci.followManId = #{followManId} and
to_days(ci.startDate) = to_days(NOW())
to_days(ci.startDate) < to_days(NOW()) and ci.statu = '0'
to_days(ci.planDate) = to_days(NOW())
DATE_FORMAT( ci.startDate, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE( ) , '%Y%m' )
limit #{start},#{rows}
